review: So far its ok,  but lacks a lot compared to my roku.
author: Luckylwsw

review: It buffers every minute or so. For a minute or 2. Does not look like a viable product for me.Also, it does not appear to access much free content or reasonably priced programming. I am not going to pay $2.99 for 1 episode of the Simpsons season 1.
author: John Callahan

review: Just received & got it set up. I an sure I will enjoy  watching movies , etc.
author: Carolyn Hansel

review: Great product if you want to stream amazon prime thru HDMI anywhere you go that has wifi.
author: Matthew Degel

review: This is a great tool to turn your tv into a smart tv with prime. I use the fire stick more than my Apple tv.
author: Kindle Customer

review: Instant set up and we have enjoyed kids programming and Downton Abbey on our big screen instead of small home office monitor! Great parental controls our girls ages 2-10 like old skool pink panther, Mister Rogers Neighborhood, and more all on HD.
author: mama4ballerinas

review: Just the right device for streaming.Maybe a bit too much Amazon stuff, but OK.Be smart, do not buy a Smart TV.
author: Soren Kragh

review: The Firestick is so easy to setup!! Works flawlessly and quickly! I've ordered another one for my bedroom! I highly recommend it!!!
author: Anthony Sanders
